name: Lostim
description:
--------------
Lostim is a creative puzzle game. Inside the "Lostim", everything will be separated into black and white. Simple rules and gameplay, however can be combined into mysterious and exquisite puzzles.
It will allow you to practice your way of thinking and to think outside the box in solving what appears to be simple but full of challenges.

--------------
- Simple rules and gameplay
- Creative and sophisticated puzzles
- Soft background music and sound effects
- 5 chapters, 32 levels
--------------

(Headphones recommended)
